overview: After a small girl is kidnapped by a travelling circus, her heartbroken parents put their trust in their daughterâ€™s young friend, who quickly catches up with the villainous travellers. But however hard the children try, they cannot escape, and as the years pass they are forced to accept their new, hard life on the road. Then one day, a fresh opportunity presents itself. (stumfilm.dk)
title: The Firefly
